data.actual_result: The reactions are at a larger distance from the message.
data.expected_result: The reactions are at normal distance from the message.
data.short_description: When you turn off the link preview in settings and add a reaction to a link that contains a preview, the reaction is shown further than it should be i.e there's too much padding below the message.
data.steps_to_repro: - Turn off link preview in Settings>Text & Images. - Send a link to a message that contains a link. - Add a reaction to the message.
